original_text: for my father fought for you and risked his life and delivered you from the hand of Midian,
korean_text: 우리 아버지가 전에 죽음을 무릅쓰고 너희를 위하여 싸워 미디안의 손에서 너희를 건져냈거늘

sentences.original_text: for my father fought for you
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 내 아버지는 너희를 위해 싸웠다

sentences.original_text: and delivered you from the hand of Midian
